primary.title: Packaging update
primary.para: An update of the packaging specification has been published, as well as a new implementation for Calabash and an updated implementation for Saxon.

primary.title: Packaging starts here
primary.para: The prototype for eXist of the Packaging System has just been released.

primary.title: Hey!
primary.para: The website has just been announced on various mailing lists. I hope people will subscribe to the mailing list and will provide valuable input and feedback.

primary.title: A new birth
primary.para: The website has just been launched. Hello, world!
